page.title: 05Employment in Uxbridge
page.content: We asked 96 people who lived in the Uxbridge area,about their employment. 54 people worked within the Borough and 42 people commuted to the London area outside of Hillingdon.The most popular jobs within Hillingdon were Mechanics 20%,Office workers and teachers 16%, drivers 7% and miscellaneous shop work 14%.Other jobs ranged from nursing,clerical,security, salesman and air traffic controllers. The most popular jobs amongst commuters were engineering,office work,banking,building,film work policing,computing,sales and factory work.There is a monthly press release about employment within Hillingdon published in local papers. There are several job centres in the Borough of Hillingdon and a Careers Service for young people.There are also 12 private employment agencies.
